preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 25 g of Cerium (Ce) and 25 g of Erbium (Er) using an analytical balance.
2. Measure 125 g of Indium (In) and 25 g of Magnesium (Mg).
3. Combine all the measured ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified sample from the crucible.
